document_data.caption: A map of the Shining Lands showing Myrmyr near the mouth of the Golden Water.
document_data.name: Myrmyr
document_data.mainbody: '''Myrmyr''' was a small city in [[Var the Golden]] in the [[Shining Lands]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Geography: Myrmyr was located near the western coast of the "mouth" of the [[Golden Water]]. That "mouth" was called the [[Sunstrait]] and it linked the Golden Water with the [[Great Sea]].{{Cite polyhedron/64/The Everwinking Eye: Daily Life in Mulmaster|21}}
document_data.Activites:
This small city helped protect the Golden Water from pirates and raiders, ensuring they were able to ship large quantities of grain through the [[Shining South]]. The grain fields of Myrmyr were second only to those of [[Pyratar]].

The nearby [[Ship Isle]] bustled with activity from ship yards owned by the [[Sholapur chaka]].
document_data.Inhabitants: Myrmyr hosted a population of 10,000 residents.{{Cite polyhedron/64/The Everwinking Eye: Daily Life in Mulmaster|21}}
